resources.string: The name that will be displayed on your profile.\n\nMinimum length is %d symbols

If you choose a username, people will be able to find you by this username and contact you without needing your phone number.

You can use a–z, 0–9 and underscores.
Minimum length is %d symbols.
You can write some words about yourself or other useful information.\n\nLinks, tags and message markdown are valid.
